attributes.action: Make sure that the government uphold there 5% GPD aid to developing countries in need.
attributes.additional_details: We are AtC ( AidTheCountries ) we are trying to support developing countries in need of aid and assistance form well developed countries such as Britain and america. There was a Pact made in 1975 stating that all developed countries must give AT LEAST 5% of their GDP to developing countries, at the moment in Britain the government are only providing 3% this is unacceptable and we think that they should push that percentage up to at least 5% but hopefully even more. Thanks in advance for your help in bringing equality to the world.
